A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Intense\, bold\, emotional\, surprisingly unexpected in a good way\, funny and incredibly dynamic. The performances are stunning\, the characters are complex and  turmoil as hell\, the new creatures are cool as well as the new characters\, the effects are awesome and the photography is terrific. Luke's final scene is poetic (also Yoda's). The storyline is opening the door for a multitude of possibilities to the saga. The Last Jedi is fantastic and a breath of fresh air to the franchise\, I absolutely loved it!
